content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
         JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.TRANSACTIONCURRENCYCREDITAMOUNT') TRANSACTIONCURRENCYCREDITAMOUNT
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.TRANSACTIONCURRENCYDEBITAMOUNT') TRANSACTIONCURRENCYDEBITAMOUNT
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.ACCOUNTDISPLAYVALUE') ACCOUNTDISPLAYVALUE
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'BYOD/ADAXGeneralJournalAccountEntryStaging/ADAXGeneralJournalAccountEntryStaging_*.json',
        data_source = 'ispheresynapse',
        format = 'csv',
        fieldterminator ='0x0b',
        fieldquote = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS [result]
order by 3, 1 desc
